title: Trump Org and Inaugural Committee pay $750,000 to settle D.C. AG lawsuit over hotel overcharges
summary:
The D.C. Attorney General announced a $750,000 settlement resolving allegations that the
Presidential Inaugural Committee and Trump Organization improperly overpaid for event space
at the Trump International Hotel in January 2017. Defendants denied wrongdoing as part of
the settlement.
notes:
Include primary AG release plus multiple mainstream confirmations; this resolves the civil suit
without admissions, but recovers nonprofit funds.
actors: District of Columbia Office of Attorney General
